title: Interpretation of the death of a father: In a dream, I saw my deceased father

preview.html: Dreaming of a dead father and seeing the dead father return to life, or seeing the dead father in a dream while he is alive and the dead father is sick or crying for an unmarried woman, a married woman, a pregnant divorced woman to bring the dead father back to life according to Ibn Sirin and others. The deceased father in a dream is one of the beautiful dreams that we see. In our dreams, in which we see the father after death in our dreams, it carries many connotations and signs that come to the dreamer, which we must know fully, such as the father represents safety, security, warmth and tenderness for all people, and seeing the father in a dream means safety, security and solving problems as The father is the mainstay in every family. Imam Ibn Sirin, the great dream interpreter, explained to us the signs and signals of seeing a father in a dream, which carry many, many important clues for people that must be fully informed to obtain an interpretation. Interpretation of the death of a father in a dream: seeing the deceased One of the important visions that always caused confusion to the dreamer. The symbol of the deceased has multiple meanings and interpretations, especially if the deceased was a relative. Brother, son or daughter, has very important meanings for the dreamer. Seeing a father in a dream. A father is a symbol of security, and seeing a father in a dream indicates the need for support and support, especially if the dreamer is going through difficult times. Seeing a deceased father in a dream is a message to the dreamer not to despair. And he loses hope, so comfort is at the door, God willing. Seeing the dead in a dream is generally related to the state they are in in the dream. If he sees his father in a good condition, laughing and smiling, this may indicate his condition before his Lord, and the arrival of zakat and supplication from the righteous son. But if the father Is alive and maintains his diet while awake, and died in a dream and came back to life in a dream, the vision is promising for the financial and professional situation of the family, good news for recovery, etc. The presence of a parent, whether alive or dead, and their coming is good news for the dreamer of protection or victory in everything that concerns him. .. Most of these expressions and purposes may be familiar to some but here I want to add another concrete aspect of our modern life about the coming of the dead father to explain its symbols and causes in strange dreams and visions: Many brothers and sisters see their dead father coming to them in a dream, so he may come in a dream Different. Reasons, including: that he is approaching death and that his memory is still in the mind and heart, which makes the person talk to himself due to the intense overflow of longing and longing. The father may come in a dream to reassure the injustice surrounding the dreamer, and most of these visions bother females more than males because the father indicates To their safety, protection, and loss of security. He may complete another year after his death because of his narration of the previous year and the above. What is this when the father frowns and gets angry or comes to urge and guide you to do something is when you see him in your dream # doing some work, so his work is just a symbol urging you to do something similar only with the symbol The return of the father in a dream has many promising interpretations, as his arrival is R

title: I dreamed that I gave birth to a boy, what is the interpretation of the dream?

preview.html: I dreamed that I gave birth to a boy. I dreamed that I gave birth to a boy. One of the dreams is that the dreamer feels joyful, and he can also feel confusion and anxiety, and the vision ultimately depends on the shape of the boy who appears and the social status of the dreamer. I dreamed that I gave birth to a boy, what is the interpretation of the dream? If an unmarried girl sees that she has given birth to a boy The interpretation of her vision differs from that of an already pregnant woman who is about to give birth, as well as a married woman, whether she has children or not, so let us find out about that. Some details through our topic today. Giving birth in any way means getting rid of the burdens that burdened the dreamer, regardless of his social status or age, and in particular, the birth of a child can vary from one person to another. If the dreamer is a man and he sees in His dream is that his wife gave birth to him a strong-willed and good-looking son, so his memory will remain immortal and his good deeds will remain after his death, and it may be of benefit to him. Teach him that he pays his zakat in his life and finds it in his newspaper when he meets God Almighty. If a single woman sees him in her dream while she is going through a bad phase of her life, then it is good for her that this period will end well and that the near future will bring her good news and pleasant surprises. Interpretation scholars said that if His birth was easy and easy, all the problems he was going through will be overcome in a very short time, and he does not despair and does what he must and leaves the matter in the hands of God (the Most High). But if the woman sees that she suffers from extreme fatigue during childbirth and almost dies in that Time, there is a big problem that she will get into and run away after the trouble and it can leave a mark on her. For a long time after. The birth of an ugly child expresses discomfort in life, whether it is in life with a partner or the presence of problems within the scope of work. What is the interpretation of a dream about the birth of a son by Ibn Sirin? The scholar Ibn Sirin realized that the birth of a boy in a dream is different from the birth of a son. The female, and he did not say that she is worthy of praise unless the dreamer is a virgin, in which case it expresses her great goodness. If a woman is pregnant and sees that she is giving birth to a boy, then she will stumble in her birth and may go through marital strife at that time, but it will end quickly without any harm to the soul. For a young man to see that he is the one giving birth to a boy who is not good-looking, expresses the fatigue that the young man faces in his life and the difficulties that disturb him and prevent him from achieving his goals. If a barren woman sees this boy in her dream and he emerges from her womb, then the Lord (Glory be to Him) may please her, or Her worries leave her, and she finds happiness in being satisfied with what pleases her. It is written and stability in her married life. He also said that the debtor’s vision of this dream expresses his ability to pay his debts with the help of someone close to him. I dreamed that I gave birth to a boy while I am single, so what is the interpretation of the dream? I dreamed that I gave birth to a boy while I am single. Depending on the form of the child, the interpretation is for the girl, Either with peace of mind and good circumstances, or with many worries and concerns that overwhelm her for a period of time. Seeing childbirth pain and its problems in a girl indicates poor memory or

title: Interpretation of the navel in a dream and seeing the navel in a dream

preview.html: Dreaming about the navel means pleasure, food, and other interpretations. We will translate it for the single, the married, the pregnant, the divorced, and the man as something coming out of the navel to see the navel open, cleansing from the filth of the navel, blood coming out of the navel, the appearance of the navel, the infant, or the umbilical cord, according to Ibn Sirin and others in a continuous series. Issue: Interpretation of a secret in a dream Seeing the navel in a dream is an indication of the treatment and satisfaction of a man and his wife. Whoever sees something that beautifies or humiliates him, then its interpretation: The navel is in the man’s wife or his lover, and it is evidence of the strength and will of the dreamer, so whatever he saw in the navel of ugliness, beauty, or bad condition. , and then in them. Whoever sees that a disease, pus, or tumor has affected the navel in his dream, this means that his wife or one of his family members will be exposed to illness or harm or will face problems. Seeing something bad in the navel may indicate that the dreamer is suffering from some problem or A bad mood and weakness of character appear. It was said: Whoever has two children and his navel is sick, this indicates that the two children will be afflicted with the disease, and whoever does not have parents, this indicates their homeland. Seeing the navel in a dream is an indication of the dreamer’s mother or father, or an indication of his profits. Which he lived by, or to the art that he practiced. Perhaps he meant his wife, his maid, or his sealed bag, and seeing his navel open in a dream. If he sees his navel open while he is sick, this indicates his death. Perhaps the navel meant pleasure and secrecy. Whoever sees: pain in his navel loses his parents or his homeland, and if he is in a foreign country, this indicates his return to his country. The navel indicates the honor of the mother, or connection to her, or the opposite of the meaning, according to what the sleeper saw in it; Because it connects the child to his mother at the time of pregnancy. The navel may indicate a hole in the eye or ear or something similar to them in the body due to resemblance and sharing the same body if the navel is internal or empty. The navel of an unknown woman may indicate a well or a hole in the ground, and it may indicate the whirlpool of the sea and quicksand. If it is an internal or false navel. The navel may refer to the mouth because it is an opening connected to the abdomen. The navel may indicate a weak point in a person’s personality because it is a weak point in the body. The navel is a joy.. a secret.. secrets.. and a surah. The belly button can indicate success. Operations because they are tied or stitched, as is the case in operating rooms. The navel may indicate a type of orange called the “navel orange.” Seeing the navel is good for residents of areas with volcanic mountains and may indicate that volcanoes have calmed down and not erupted. Seeing a man’s navel may indicate that the person Very close to committing what is forbidden, or it may indicate the limits of God Almighty, because it is the limits of a man’s private organs. The belly button can indicate sewing, patching clothes with thread, or closing and repairing holes and gaps. Seeing the navel is considered beneficial for someone who has a large belly, because it represents a deficiency In the abdomen, and in a dream it can indicate a lean and protruding abdomen. Perhaps the navel is a lack of sustenance because it is a deficiency in the appearance of the abdomen, and there may be an excuse for the dreamer not to waste the excess in eating; Because it is a deficiency in the stomach, and the stomach is dirty. Part of food. Perhaps the B button indicates

title: I want to explain my dream in detail

preview.html: Dreams are sometimes divine messages that come to warn, preach, or warn of the opinion that something will happen and sometimes they can be dreams resulting from the accumulation of things in the subconscious mind. Ibn Sirin is one of the most famous dream scholars. Abu Bakr Muhammad ibn Sirin Al-Basri is one of the greatest dream interpretation scholars. He is an imam A great follower of jurisprudence, interpretation and hadith, as well as in interpreting or expressing visions. He was born during the reign of Othman bin Affan in the year thirty-three AH, and he died in the year 110 at the age of 78 years. His upbringing and upbringing are considered pious and pious, and Ibn Shirin was in contact with a large number of the companions of the Messenger of God, may God bless him and grant him peace. May God bless him and grant him peace, including: Anas bin Malik, Abu Hurairah, Zaid bin Thabit, Abdullah bin Al-Zubayr and others. Ibn Sirin became famous for his book Ibn Sirin, The Interpretation of Dreams, but the truth is that Ibn Sirin himself did not write a book on the interpretation of dreams and it was his students who wrote about This book. See also: Dreams come true after sunrise. How do you interpret dreams? Most of the visions that come to mind can be a sign and a message from Almighty God. The interpretation of dreams depends on most dream interpretation scholars in relation to the Book of God and the Sunnah of the Messenger of God, may God bless him and grant him peace, when they came. Seeing our master Abraham slaughtering Mr. Ismail. Also, when our Master Joseph was inside the prison walls, he interpreted the vision for the prisoners and the king. The science of dreams is full of many things that need a wonderful study. Interpretation of the dream of death in a dream in detail. Whoever sees the angel of death calling him in a dream shows quick repentance and takes refuge in Almighty God. It may be Seeing death and its rituals is a sign of abandoning work. A familiar person in a dream expressing his opinion upon his death is a sign of the bond between them that will be severed, and God knows best. While seeing the dead in a dream is the result of the circumstances that a person goes through and that affect his psychological state, God knows best. Perhaps Seeing a dead person is a sign that the mind will fail to reach the things it wants and desires. If an unmarried girl sees death in a dream, this is evidence of her separation from a person she may be in a relationship with, and God knows best. Perhaps this dream about single women is a sign of the beginning of A new life for him. Or she obtains an academic qualification and watches from God that the anxiety that resides in her heart will disappear. As for the married woman who saw in a dream news coming to her about the death of one of her close friends, it is a sign that this friend is going through many crises. And if you see a married woman and death in The dream of a married woman, this may be a sign of the problems and conflicts that exist with her husband’s family. And if he hears the news of a dead person in a dream, it is a praiseworthy vision that he may bring this news that brings happiness, God willing. The death of her and her life partner in her dream is a warning of divorce. Read also : How to cancel the interpretation of a dream: A dream of death in a dream for a pregnant woman and a divorced woman. A pregnant woman who dreams of her death is a sign that her due date is approaching, and God knows best. Seeing someone close to her dying in a dream for a pregnant woman indicates that there are difficult things going on.

While seeing the dead in a dream is the result of the circumstances that a person goes through and that affect his psychological state, God knows best. Perhaps Seeing a dead person is a sign that the mind will fail to reach the things it wants and desires. If an unmarried girl sees death in a dream, this is evidence of her separation from a person she may be in a relationship with, and God knows best. Perhaps this dream about single women is a sign of the beginning of A new life for him. Or she obtains an academic qualification and watches from God that the anxiety that resides in her heart will disappear. As for the married woman who saw in a dream news coming to her about the death of one of her close friends, it is a sign that this friend is going through many crises. And if you see a married woman and death in The dream of a married woman, this may be a sign of the problems and conflicts that exist with her husband’s family. And if he hears the news of a dead person in a dream, it is a praiseworthy vision that he may bring this news that brings happiness, God willing. The death of her and her life partner in her dream is a warning of divorce. Read also : How to cancel the interpretation of a dream: A dream of death in a dream for a pregnant woman and a divorced woman. A pregnant woman who dreams of her death is a sign that her due date is approaching, and God knows best. Seeing someone close to her dying in a dream for a pregnant woman indicates that there are difficult things going on.

title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing chickens in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing chicks in a dream Interpretation of dreams about seeing chicks in a dream is one of the dreams in which the pioneers feel a lot of anxiety, because seeing it certainly has many clues and symbols of opinion, so we deal with the interpretation of dreams about chicks in a dream for a single woman, married, pregnant, male, we know what is the interpretation of small chicks, white and red chicks, what is the meaning of seeing chicks being roasted or slaughtered? What is the meaning of seeing eating a chicken thigh or breast, all this through the interpretation of the chicken according to the opinion of Arab scholars and interpreters. Interpretation of a dream about chicks by Ibn Shaheen: Seeing many chicks in the house is evidence that the dreamer will obtain a prestigious position in society. Seeing the feathers of chicks in a dream means that the owner of the dream will soon obtain great wealth. Cooking chicks in a dream means that you will hear good news soon. Eating chicken meat in a dream is evidence that the dreamer got rid of his fears and problems in his life. Slaughtering chicks in a dream indicates that the dreamer has witnessed many bad events in his life. Seeing chickens lying on eggs is evidence of a widow raising her children. Interpretation of a dream about chicks for a single woman: Interpretation of a dream about chicks in a dream for a single girl is evidence of a failed love relationship, as well as a failed marriage. Cooked chicks in an unmarried woman’s dream symbolize a happy and stable marriage. Eating the head of a chick in an unmarried woman’s dream indicates the loss of a precious person in her heart. As for eating chicken legs in a dream for an unmarried woman, this indicates that she She made a big mistake and this in turn affects their future. Interpretation of a dream about slaughtering chicks in a dream for an unmarried girl carries an indication that she will marry someone without her family's knowledge. Seeing chicks for single women symbolizes that she will get a prestigious job or that one of her many friends will meet her. Interpretation of cooking chicks in a dream for an unmarried woman shows their connection. Interpretation of a dream about chicks for a married woman: Interpretation of seeing chicks in a married woman's dream is a sign of marital problems and family conflicts. Interpretation of slaughtering chicks in a dream for a married woman is evidence of another woman in her husband's life and the dreamer is trying to get rid of her, and here we see that slaughtering indicates her victory over her. The harsh chicks that a married woman dreams of are evidence of pain and turmoil in children and husband. Likewise, a married woman who has not yet given birth and sees chicks in a dream indicates that she will soon become pregnant with them. Interpretation of a dream about chicks for a pregnant woman: A pregnant woman feels very anxious and tense about everything around her, fearing that her fetus will be harmed, even if it appears in her dream that she is anxious and always tends to search for her To feel reassured. Interpretation of seeing chicks in a dream for a pregnant woman and cooking them, this indicates that she will enjoy happiness and joy in her life. Seeing black chicks in a dream for a pregnant woman means that she has a child. As for white chicks in a dream for a pregnant woman, this is a sign

title: Seeing urinating in a dream for a married woman and interpretation of the dream of urinating by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Urinating in a dream for a married woman. Interpreters believe that the dream carries many interpretations that vary depending on the details of the dream and the dreamer’s feeling. In the lines of this article, we will talk about the vision of urinating for a married and pregnant woman according to Ibn Sirin and the leading interpretation scholars. Urinating in a dream for a married woman according to Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of urination in a dream for a married woman? Interpretation of a dream about urination for a married woman indicates abundant livelihood, an increase in money, and aspirations for the near future. If a married woman sees urine on her bed, the vision indicates that marital disputes and problems will end soon, and if the dreamer is unable to control urination Ibn Sirin says that urinating in a dream for a married woman is good if she is poor or going through a financial crisis, as this indicates improved financial conditions. If the dreamer is rich, then the dream symbolizes the loss of money, and if the dreamer urinates on her clothes, the dream indicates the existence of disagreements between her and her friends. Urinating in a dream indicates that the married woman feels anxious and stressed and that there are some obstacles in her life. To reach the most accurate interpretation of your dream, search from: Google on the Egyptian Dream Interpretation website, which includes thousands of interpretations by the most important interpreters. Urinating in a dream for a pregnant woman. Interpretation of a dream about urinating for a pregnant woman indicates the approaching date of her birth, so she needs to prepare well, and seeing urine indicates to the dreamer that her birth will be easy, smooth, and free of problems. . Health conditions will improve soon. It is said that urinating in a dream for a pregnant woman foretells that her financial situation will improve soon and that she will be able to pay off all her debts. Interpretation of a dream about urinating in front of people in a dream for a married woman: Seeing her urinating in front of people means that the married woman made a wrong decision in the previous period and feels remorse. Upon taking it, and the dreamer saw her husband urinating on her in front of people, the dream symbolizes an imminent pregnancy. Interpretation of a dream of urinating on the ground for a married woman: A dream of urinating on the ground for a married woman heralds good news. If she is sick, God (Glory be to Him) will heal her soon. Also, seeing urinating on the ground means that the dreamer will soon receive an invitation to attend a happy occasion belonging to a loved one. It is said that urine staining the floor in a dream is a sign. Because blessing and abundance of livelihood in reality, and urinating on the ground generally symbolizes good behavior among people. Interpretation of a dream of urinating on clothes in a dream for a married woman: Interpretation scholars believe that a dream of urinating on clothes for a married woman symbolizes the abundance of nutrition that awaits her in the coming days, and in the event that the dreamer urinates On her clothes, the vision foretells that positive changes will occur in her. Life in the near future, and urinating on clothes in a dream is an indication that the dreamer will earn a lot of money from her work in the upcoming period.

title: What you do not know about the interpretation of supplication in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: What are the meanings of calling in a dream? One of the dreamers asked him about the interpretation of his vision, which states the following (I saw someone calling me in a dream), and the interpreter answered him with many interpretations that you will know through the specialized Egyptian website. We will show you everything that Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi and other scholars said, just follow the following paragraphs. Calling in a dream Calling in a dream is considered one of the precise visions whose interpretations vary depending on its symbols, which means that the dreamer may see in his dream someone calling him and addressing him with a specific message. Each of them separately through the following points: Whether or not: If the dreamer sees in a dream that he is in a place that he does not know and that frightens him, and he hears someone calling him forcefully, then this vision carries two symbols: First: A strange, frightening place. Second: The person who called. If the two symbols meet together in the vision This will lead to the death of the dreamer, provided that he is not aware of the person who called him. Second: If the dreamer is in an unfamiliar house and hears someone calling him and responds to him and wants to search for him to find out who it is that is calling him. The meaning of this scene is bad and suggests that the viewer is a weak person and perhaps... The meaning of the word (weak) is weak character and inability to face life's challenges, and this bad trait contains many things. Among his bad qualities are the following: The great ability of others to easily influence the dreamer, and this deprives him of his opinion in many situations. He may fail in his emotional, professional and personal life. Others may attack him and take away his rights, then he loses the ability and ability that qualifies him to regain that right. The rapist is from him. Third: The way the call is made in the dream has a strong influence on the interpretation of the dream. For example, if the dreamer heard someone calling him and that person laughed so loudly that his laughter reached laughter and was louder than usual. In this scene, Ibn Sirin said that it will be interpreted the opposite, that is, this laughter heard in the dream will turn into Crying and lamentation in waking life, and the dreamer will soon experience dreary days, all of them sorrows. He may soon cry when he hears that a loved one has died. He may be sad because he has lost something big in his life, such as losing all his money, or a major loss that deteriorates his financial situation Terrifyingly. Perhaps the reason for the crying is the loss of a lover and separation from him, and perhaps the interpretation of this scene is that he will cry after hearing the news of his failure or dismissal from work. However, there is an important thing that must be made clear, which is: Although it is difficult to interpret this dream, all difficult situations In life it is fleeting, no matter how long you are with the person. The interpretation of seeing it as not good is to pray to God to remove any adversity from him, as he may go through it while facing crises in his life, but God’s providence will be a reason to relieve his pain and pressure. Interpretation of seeing the call in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin had his unique mark in interpreting this dream and provided It has four important interpretations: Whether or not: Ibn Sirin said that this vision in general is one of the symbols that quickly brings sadness and sorrow to the pioneer. He may be exposed to betrayal.

title: Interpretation of a dream about dates by Ibn Sirin and leading interpreters

preview.html: Dream Interpretation of DatesDoes this vision seem good or does it portend a lot of bad things to come? What are the consequences of eating dates? What do spoiled dates indicate in a dream? Through this article, we will clearly explain all the meanings mentioned in everything we mentioned so that the dreamer will not be distracted by many different interpretations and meanings. Interpretation of dreams for dates. Many of the most important interpretation scholars have said that seeing dates in a dream is one of the good visions that carries many connotations and meanings, and it indicates goodness. Which will happen in the dreamer’s life, and the reason is that he glorifies and thanks God at all times and moments. There was another opinion from some of the most important news of interpretation scholars, which is that if the dreamer sees the presence of dates in his dream, this symbolizes heavy rains coming soon, and God is Greatest and Most Knowing. If One sees himself eating dates in his dream, then this indicates that he is a good person who watches God in all aspects of his life and does not delay in anything related to his Lord because he fears God and fears His punishment. If one sees himself putting dates in the refrigerator during his sleep, this means that he is a very careful person. He makes all the important decisions related to his life, be it personal or professional, and takes advantage of opportunities to make yourself successful and bright. Future. Seeing the dreamer himself drinking date wine during his dream is evidence that he is going through illegal methods to achieve his goals and dreams and achieve a lot of profits and gains. If a man sees himself eating dates in a dream, this is a sign that he will receive a lot of good and happy news that will make His heart is very happy.Interpretation of a dream about dates by Ibn Sirin. The scholar Ibn Sirin said that seeing a date in a dream is one of the dreams that portends goodness and indicates the death of all the worries and problems that the dreamer was going through for long periods, and the reason is his feeling of worry and anxiety. Great concern. A scourge. If a man sees himself collecting dates in his dream, this is a sign that his wife’s date with a good girl who has many good qualities and morals is approaching, which will be a reason for her to live with him quietly. And a happy life completely free of disputes and problems. Seeing himself picking dates from trees in his dream indicates that he earns all his money through forbidden means, and therefore he must return to God (Glory be to Him) for forgiveness and mercy. If a man sees himself eating delicious dates in his sleep This symbolizes the blessings and goodness that will fill his life in the coming periods, which will be the reason for him being able to improve his financial level. If one sees himself cutting dates and taking the grains in a dream, this means that God will give birth to a boy for him, and God is higher and knows best soon. Vision The dreamer picks dates from trees during his sleep, as this is evidence of entering into a new emotional relationship with a beautiful girl that will greatly help him in achieving all his wishes and desires during the following periods. The interpretation of seeing dates in general in a dream is an indication that God will open up to the dreamer. Many wide doors of kindness and nourishment, which will be his reason

If a man sees himself eating delicious dates in his sleep, this symbolizes the blessings and goodness that will fill his life in the coming periods, which will be a reason for him to be able to improve his financial level. If a person sees himself cutting dates and taking the grains in a dream, this means that God will give birth to a male child for him, and God is higher and knows best soon. Seeing the dreamer picking dates from trees in his sleep, this is evidence of entering into a new emotional relationship with a beautiful girl who will be a reason for greatly helping him in achieving all his desires and desires during the following periods.
